content: In fact, for 2 years post acquisition, we update our Board every quarter on not only the acquired company's financial performance but also on synergies achieved as well as how the overall integration is progressing. Our consolidated gross profit for the first quarter of $16 million was up 19% from the prior year, and our gross margin expanded 100 basis points to 29.3%. First quarter adjusted diluted earnings per share was $0.54, which represents a 2% decrease compared to Q1 of the prior fiscal year.
